About us

We are a Credit Card and ATM Processing Company located in Miami, Florida. We help our clients get business done.

Secure Pay Service was founded in 2019 by Freddie Castro Jr. with 20 years experience in the merchant & ATM industry.

We strive to create a more intimate and personal venue in Merchant Services along with ATM Processing.

Who are we?

Secure Pay Services is a merchant and ATM provider. Delivering premium service, Secure Pay Services understands that business is personal. Priding itself on the ability to provide tailor-made payment processing solutions for even the most unique merchant accounts.

What do we do?

Payment Solutions

ATM Services

Mobile Payments

See all services

Who do we serve?

Servicing industries from all verticals and sizes no request is too small or arduous for Secure Pay Services, offering a multitude of processing platforms for both on and offshore. Proudly offering merchant account holders 24/7 access to an entirely U.S based customer support team, making customer service our leading priority. Developing and nurturing long-term relationships with both merchants and banking partners allows us to provide the most up-to-date information from the world of payment processing. Keeping our merchants insulated from changes in the landscape that could potentially affect business.

We construct thoughtfully crafted payment processing solutions with the most technologically advanced and secure equipment on the market. Merchants can rest easily knowing their assets and customers are safe. Fast set-up, ease of use, and customizable options are just a few of the payment processing hallmarks from Secure Pay Service. Secure Pay Service is a registered ISO of Fifth Third Bank, N.A., Cincinnati, OH

What our customers say

Request a call back

We want to hear from you. If you are interested in setting up a new merchant account with us, please contact us through the form below and we'll call between the hours of 9:00 AM and 7:00 PM EST, Monday-Friday. If you require assistance with an existing account, please call our customer service line 24/7/365.

This contact form is for US customers only. If you are looking for one of our other locations, please email info@securepayservice.com.

By providing us with an email address you are expressly consenting to receiving email communications — including but not limited to marketing material/advertising, promotions, sales campaigns, and questioner/research surveys. By providing us with a telephone number for a cellular phone or other wireless device, including a number that you later convert to a cellular number, you are expressly consenting to receiving communications — including but not limited to prerecorded or artificial voice message calls, text messages, and calls made by an automatic telephone dialing system—from us and our affiliates and agents at that number. This express consent applies to each such telephone number that you provide to us now or in the future and permits such calls for non-marketing purposes. Calls and messages may incur access fees from your cellular provider. We accept relay calls. Your privacy is important to us. By clicking “submit” you agree to our terms and conditions.
